name: apprise
description: Apprise is a notification system and unified API that lets you send alerts to over 90 services such as Slack, email, SMS, Telegram etc. It provides a CLI and Python API, ideal for self-hosted automation and alerts.
features: Unified Notifications: Send alerts to 90+ services from one API. One interface for everything.
Multi-Service: Support for Slack, Discord, Telegram, email, SMS, and many more. Reach anyone anywhere.
CLI and API: Use from command line or integrate via Python API. Flexible integration.
Self-Hosted Alerts: Perfect for automation, monitoring, and custom notifications. Complete control.
Simple Syntax: Easy-to-use URL-based configuration for services. Quick setup.
Batch Notifications: Send to multiple services simultaneously with one call. Efficient alerting.
